text: Arau i'uchuphe te'omra pitr-matrka ucca asanata bahuraale arau te'omloka sakalorae te'omra sanmanata chajadaranata ha’la. Tetiya te'om ka’le, ‘he mora pitr! E'itorae'i mora saponara byakhya; mora pratipalake iyaka satyata parainata karaiche arau teraemi moka karaagarara paraa mukta karaiche arau cayatane mora arau mora bhatrsakalara samparka binasta karaara pichato aponalokaka maraubhumi ancalara paraa iyata ani te'om mora prati anugraha karaiche. Niscaya mora pratipalake yi iccha karae seya nipunatara saite karae. Niscaya teraemi sarbajna, prajnamaya’
